mapper.select: SELECT s.*, p.productNm, p.categoryCd, p.price, c.codeNm as 'unitNm' FROM sale s INNER JOIN product p ON s.productId = p.id INNER JOIN code c ON s.unitCd = c.code AND c.codeGbn = 'UNIT' ORDER BY s.endDate DESC
SELECT * FROM product WHERE id NOT IN (SELECT productId FROM sale WHERE endDate>=#{today}) AND categoryCd=#{categoryCd} AND delDt is null
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sale VALUES(null, #{productId}, #{amount}, #{unitCd}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{insId}, now(), #{updId}, null);
mapper.update: UPDATE sale SET amount=#{amount}, unitCd=#{unitCd}, startDate=#{startDate}, endDate=#{endDate}, updId=#{updId}, updDt=now() WHERE id=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT p.*, (SELECT avg(rating) FROM comment cm WHERE p.id=cm.productId AND delId is null GROUP BY productId) as ratingAvg , s.id saleId, s.amount, s.unitCd, s.startDate, s.endDate FROM product p LEFT OUTER JOIN sale s ON p.id=s.productId AND endDate>=#{today} WHERE delId is null AND s.id is not null ORDER BY id DESC
